english.segment1: O Come, O Come, Emmanuel. And ransom captive Israel. That mourns in lonely exile here. Until the son of God appears
english.segment2: Rejoice, Rejoice, Emmanuel. Shall come to thee, O Israel!
english.segment3: O come, Thou Rod of Jesse, free. Thine own from Satan's tyranny. From depths of hell Thy people save. And give them victory over the grave
english.segment4: Rejoice, Rejoice, Emmanuel. Shall come to thee, O Israel!
english.segment5: O come, Desire of nations, bind. In one the hearts of all mankind. Bid Thou our sad divisions cease, And be Thyself our king of peace
english.segment6: Rejoice, Rejoice, Emmanuel. Shall come to thee, O Israel!
english.segment7: So Rejoice, Rejoice, Emmanuel. Has come to thee, O Israel!. Has come to thee, O Israel!. Israel!
